channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sen. Tillis issues ultimatum to embattled GOP candidate in crucial swing state: ‘Owes it to President Trump’

item.title: Nearly 98,000 Arizonans whose citizenship hadn't been confirmed can vote full ballot, court rules
item.description: The Arizona Supreme Court ruled Friday that nearly 98,000 people whose citizenship documents hadn't been confirmed can vote in state and local races.

item.title: Nancy Mace Will Use Any Weapon at Hand to Fight for What Matters: Attention

item.title: Leftist ‘Voter Guide’ Group Pushes Its Way Into Universities
item.description: While the group claims its voter resources are 'nonpartisan,' the guides indicate a clear bias in favor of left-wing candidates.

item.title: Arizona Supreme Court rules 98,000 people whose citizenship is unconfirmed can vote in pivotal election
item.description: The Arizona Supreme Court ruled Friday that nearly 98,000 people whose citizenship documents hadn’t been confirmed can vote in state and local races.

item.title: Election Integrity Advocates Can Inspect South Carolina Voter Rolls, Federal Judge Rules
item.description: The election integrity group will now be allowed access to voter roll data to ensure ineligible persons are not casting ballots.
